subject: Add fund catalog UI for Phase 3 trading
body:
- Create FundsStore with mock KZAR data (NAV R1.00)
- Add FundCard component with NAV, balance, Buy/Sell buttons
- Update FundsPage with grid layout (available/coming soon sections)
- Integrate FundsStore into Root.store and useStoreHook
- Add fund-related translations
- Document ZAR/EFT payment flow in USER_FLOWS.md
- Add orders collection schema to IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md
- Confirm KZAR asset ID (KZAR_B7HGYK31_Q033) working in NCW

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Add fund catalog UI for Phase 3 trading
